formatted_address: Sales Gallery, G-23, Persiaran Medini 5, Sunway Iskandar, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Sunway Citrine Hub

reviews.text: A relatively new mall but served the region well as there wasnâ€™t many things yet. The supermarket located here is big and well stocked. Could find most of the items that we were looking for. There is also a seven eleven within the mall. DIY shop is located on level two. There is a caring pharmacy too. Clean washroom and ample parking facilities as well. Spotted some eateries around the mall too.

no much shop inside mall here, but still can find jaya grocer supermarket, pharmacy, diy shop and some restaurants like sushi house, pizza... convenience enough for residence and airbnb stay beside.
get more restaurants including starbucks, about 400~600meter from this mall. try korea bbq there, which quite nice taste.
This mall is clean and looks new. But not so many stores open. It has Jaya Grocer as main tenant. Also got old town, pharmacy, and few restaurants. And you can get free parking.

To the management of Sunway Citrine, do ensure the playground is clean especially if children are required to remove their shoes. Please consider putting some fencing so animals cannot freely use the playground as a toilet.
Small mall. Open air concept. Not many shops open yet. Jaya Grocer supermarket is the anchor tenant. I will come back to hang out at Awesome Brew. This place looks great.

vicinity: Sales Gallery, G-23, Persiaran Medini 5, Sunway Iskandar, Iskandar Puteri
